The Wind Rises

Rank: 303


Jiro Horikoshi studies assiduously to fulfill his aim of becoming an aeronautical engineer. As WWII begins- fighter aircraft designed by him end up getting used by the Japanese Empire against its foes.


Director: Hayao Miyazaki

Writer: Hayao Miyazaki

Stars: Hideaki Anno, Hidetoshi Nishijima, Miori Takimoto

Tags: Adult Animation, Anime, Hand,Drawn Animation, Period Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy, Tragic Romance, Workplace Drama, Animation, Biography
